property.name: oozie.services.ext
property.description: To add/replace services defined in 'oozie.services' with custom implementations. Class names must be separated by commas.

property.name: oozie.system.id
property.description: The Oozie system ID.

property.name: oozie.systemmode
property.description: System mode for Oozie at startup.

property.name: oozie.service.AuthorizationService.security.enabled
property.description: Specifies whether security (user name/admin role) is enabled or not. If disabled any user can manage Oozie system and manage any job.

property.name: oozie.service.PurgeService.older.than
property.description: Jobs older than this value, in days, will be purged by the PurgeService.

property.name: oozie.service.CallableQueueService.threads
property.description: Number of threads used for executing callables

property.name: oozie.service.coord.normal.default.timeout
property.description: Default timeout for a coordinator action input check (in minutes) for normal job. -1 means infinite timeout

property.name: oozie.service.JPAService.create.db.schema
property.description:
Creates Oozie DB.
If set to true, it creates the DB schema if it does not exist. If the DB schema exists is a NOP. If set to false, it does not create the DB schema. If the DB schema does not exist it fails start up.

property.name: oozie.service.JPAService.jdbc.driver
property.description: JDBC driver class.

property.name: oozie.service.JPAService.jdbc.url
property.description: JDBC URL.

property.name: oozie.service.JPAService.jdbc.username
property.description: DB user name.

property.name: oozie.service.JPAService.jdbc.password
property.description:
DB user password.
IMPORTANT: if password is emtpy leave a 1 space string, the service trims the value, if empty Configuration assumes it is NULL.

property.name: oozie.service.PurgeService.coord.older.than
property.description: Completed coordinator jobs older than this value, in days, will be purged by the PurgeService.

property.name: oozie.service.WorkflowAppService.system.libpath
property.description: System library path to use for workflow applications. This path is added to workflow application if their job properties sets the property 'oozie.use.system.libpath' to true.

property.name: oozie.service.ActionService.exception.override
property.description: List of overrides which would be applied to exceptions thrown in action. action-class-glob-pattern=exception-class-name[error-type or ?|error-code or ?] eg)*=java.lang.Exception[NON_TRANSIENT|?]

property.name: oozie.service.CoordMaterializeTriggerService.lookup.interval
property.description: Coordinator Job Lookup trigger command is scheduled at this "interval" (in seconds).

property.name: oozie.service.XLogService.trim
property.description: If set to true, log does not display if parameter is null and use the action name instead id.

property.name: oozie.action.hive.ping.enabled
property.description: Specifies whether ping check is enabled or not. If disabled hive action can be indefinitely waiting when hive server is not shutdown gracefully.

property.name: oozie.service.LiteWorkflowStoreService.user.retry.error.code.ext
property.description: Automatic retry interval for workflow action is handled for these specified extra error code.

property.name: oozie.service.LiteWorkflowStoreService.user.retry.suspend
property.description: Action is handled as NON_TRANSIENT if the user retry does not resolve the problem.

property.name: oozie.service.HiveAccessService.passwd.provider
property.description: Specifies hive password provider method.

property.name: oozie.service.HiveAccessService.passwd.provider.custom.class
property.description: Specifies hive password provider.

property.name: oozie.action.hive.session.fail.retry
property.description: If true, retry the hive action when the hive session is disconnected with HA environment.

property.name: oozie.service.CallableQueueService.callable.next.eligible
property.description: If true, when a callable in the queue has already reached max concurrency, Oozie continuously find next one which has not yet reach max concurrency.
